projects.name: Course Tracker
projects.description: A full stack web application built for the directors of Austin Coding Academy during my internship at Zollege. With a team of 4-5 developers, our goal was to deliver a useful tool for them to record and keep track of past and ongoing bootcamp courses.

projects.name: Zospace
projects.description: A product site developed from a mockup design with a team of 5 for our internship at Zollege. I had ownership of the About page and its responsive format for a perfect layout on all screens.

projects.name: Billy
projects.description: My final capstone project for Austin Coding Academy. Billy is a full stack web app that helps users track and manage their monthly bills, quickly navigate to their banks' home pages, and find bank locations nearby.

projects.name: Small Business
projects.description: Local web app featuring Austin small businesses.

projects.name: Music Dashboard
projects.description: Music Dashboard App created with a focus on MUI elements.

projects.name: Address Book
projects.description: Simple Address Book displaying information from the Random User API.

projects.name: Beer List
projects.description: Simple Beer List displaying information from the Punk API.

projects.name: Hair Salon Site
projects.description: Hair salon website project for Austin Coding Academy.

projects.name: Hangman
projects.description: Game of Hangman hackathon project for Austin Coding Academy, created with a team of 3.

projects.name: To Do List
projects.description: Simple To Do List App project for Austing Coding Academy.

projects.name: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: Game of Tic Tac Toe project for Austin Coding Academy.
